graph.packing

Class DBBTree

  • java.lang.Object
    • graph.packing.DBBTree
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ObserverIntf

    final class DBBTree
extends java.lang.Object
implements ObserverIntf
    singleton class represents the Branch&Bound Tree of the distributed version of the BB-GASP method for MWIS. Not part of the public API.

    Title: popt4jlib

    Description: A Parallel Meta-Heuristic Optimization Library in Java

    Copyright: Copyright (c) 2011-2017

    Company:

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Ioannis T. Christou

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static DBBTree getInstance()
        get the unique instance of this class in any particular JVM. A call to the static method DBBTree.init() must preceed this call.
        Returns:
        DBBTree

      • init

        public static void init(java.lang.String graphfile,
                        java.lang.String paramsfile,
                        boolean sendInitCmd)
        two-argument version of the first method that any client of this class must call to initialize the structure and possibly the workers in the network that will execute the B&B method in an asynchronous distributed manner. This method is better than the many-argument version in that the paramsfile that will be read from each worker (residing in their own file system) may specify different accumulator-hosts/ports, to reflect the fact that some workers should connect for notifications not directly to the parallel.distributed.DAccumulatorSrv server that's responsible for accumulating results from the processes, but instead to a parallel.distributed.BCastSrv that will be broadcasting any results from the accumulator server, to any process connected to it. Notice that for this to happen, the small parallel.distributed.BCastSrv2DAccumulatorBridge program needs to be running to connect the two mentioned servers.
        Parameters:
        graphfile - String
        paramsfile - String
        sendInitCmd - boolean

      • init

        public static void init(java.lang.String graphfile,
                        Graph g,
                        double initbound,
                        java.lang.String pdahost,
                        int pdaport,
                        java.lang.String cchost,
                        int ccport,
                        java.lang.String acchost,
                        int accport,
                        java.lang.String accnotificationshost,
                        int accnotificationsport,
                        boolean localsearch,
                        AllChromosomeMakerClonableIntf localsearchtype,
                        double ff,
                        int tightenboundlevel,
                        int maxitersinGBNS2A,
                        boolean sortmaxsubsets,
                        double avgpercextranodes2add,
                        boolean useGWMIN2criterion,
                        double expandlocalsearchfactor,
                        double minknownbound,
                        int maxnodechildren,
                        DBBNodeComparatorIntf dbbnodecomparator,
                        long seed,
                        boolean sendInitCmd,
                        int maxnodesallowed,
                        int dbglvl)
        the first method that any client of this class must call, to initialize the structure, and possibly the workers in the network of parallel.distributed.PDAsynchBatchTaskExecutorWrk servers that will execute the B&B method in an asynchronous distributed manner. This is a 27-argument method.
        Parameters:
        graphfile - String must be network-accessible, or else each worker node that will participate must have a copy of the graph-file in the exact same absolute path in its own file system
        g - Graph will be null when executing on worker nodes
        initbound - double
        pdahost - String
        pdaport - int
        cchost - String
        ccport - int
        acchost - String
        accport - int
        accnotificationshost - String
        accnotificationsport - int
        localsearch - boolean
        localsearchtype - AllChromosomeMakerClonableIntf
        ff - double
        tightenboundlevel - int
        maxitersinGBNS2A - int
        sortmaxsubsets - boolean
        avgpercextranodes2add - double
        useGWMIN2criterion - boolean
        expandlocalsearchfactor - double
        minknownbound - double
        maxnodechildren - int
        dbbnodecomparator - DBBNodeComparatorIntf
        seed - long
        sendInitCmd - boolean
        maxnodesallowed - int
        dbglvl - int debug level of the "default" (global, ie all) class-name

      • notifyChange

        public void notifyChange(SubjectIntf subject)
        updates the current bound. This is a call-back method executed from the DAccumulatorClt.AsynchUpdateThread.notifyObservers() which is called whenever a new incumbent is sent to the DAccumulatorSrv. It is made public because it's an interface method.
        Specified by:
        notifyChange in interface ObserverIntf
        Parameters:
        subject -
